[[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]],

document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|30}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Devamari''' ({{Pronounce|Dev|ah|MAR|ee|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was a [[doppelganger]] criminal in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Activities: The doppelganger acted as the right hand of crime lord [[Gethmedra Darmov]] at the [[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]] tavern/gladiator arena. Its role was to prevent gladiators from using magic in the fights.
